title: Benghazi Suspect Spends A Day In Court
teaser: Ahmed Abu Khattalah, a suspect charged in connection with the 2012 Benghazi attacks, had a hearing Wednesday in Washington, D.C. After a public defender outlined her arguments in Khattalah's defense, the judge ordered that he be detained.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
